backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, job vacancies, applications, posts, and messages with access control and blob storage, including CRUD, sorting, and authentication checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining color variables, themes, and global styling rules including dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React bundle and mounting the app into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration for all public, user, and admin routes and renders the RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user without admin permissions attempts to access restricted pages.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminMutat: React Query mutation hooks for creating, updating, and deleting job vacancies and posts through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useApplicatio: React Query hooks for fetching a user's applications and submitting new job applications.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerRole: React Query hook that retrieves the caller's role (admin/user/guest) from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerUser: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile using react-query and actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useJobs.ts: Hooks for listing, searching, and fetching job vacancies via actor-backed queries.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMessages.t: Messaging hooks to fetch inbox/sent messages and send new messages with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePosts.ts: Provides a hook to fetch posts from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous actor instance and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout that checks admin role, renders navigation tabs, header, and logout, and displays nested admin pages.
Admin page to list, create, edit, and delete posts with image upload support via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/VacanciesAdminP: Admin interface for managing job vacancies including creation, editing, deletion, and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/BrowseJobsP: Job browsing page with search functionality that lists vacancies and links to job details.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardLa: User dashboard layout that loads the profile, shows navigation tabs, and handles logout and onboarding redirect.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/JobDetailPa: Job detail view allowing users to see vacancy info and submit applications with optional resume upload.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MessagesPag: Renders inbox and sent messages with tabs, and includes a form to send messages using hooks and Principal validation.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MyApplicati: Displays the user's job applications with job details, status badges, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ProfilePage: Shows and edits the user's profile, including resume upload with progress and form submission via saveProfile.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/UpdatesPage: Fetches and displays announcement posts with optional images and formatted dates.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that triggers login and redirects users based on profile and role.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Onboarding form to create a user profile and optionally upload a resume.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, schema version, and a list of existing features describing required UI, authentication, user profiles, dashboards, job listings, updates, and messaging functionality.
